00054 /* temp constant defined for these funcs only... */
00055 #define NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH     0.1f
00056 
00057 static void rna_NlaStrip_name_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *value)
00058 {
00059     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip *)ptr->data;
00060     
00061     /* copy the name first */
00062     BLI_strncpy_utf8(data->name, value, sizeof(data->name));
00063     
00064     /* validate if there's enough info to do so */
00065     if (ptr->id.data) {
00066         AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(ptr->id.data);
00067         BKE_nlastrip_validate_name(adt, data);
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 static char *rna_NlaStrip_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00072 {
00073     NlaStrip *strip = (NlaStrip *)ptr->data;
00074     AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(ptr->id.data);
00075     
00076     /* if we're attached to AnimData, try to resolve path back to AnimData */
00077     if (adt) {
00078         NlaTrack *nlt;
00079         NlaStrip *nls;
00080         
00081         for (nlt = adt->nla_tracks.first; nlt; nlt = nlt->next) {
00082             for (nls = nlt->strips.first; nls; nls = nls->next) {
00083                 if (nls == strip) {
00084                     /* XXX but if we animate like this, the control will never work... */
00085                     return BLI_sprintfN("animation_data.nla_tracks[\"%s\"].strips[\"%s\"]", nlt->name, strip->name);
00086                 }
00087             }
00088         }
00089     }
00090     
00091     /* no path */
00092     return "";
00093 }

00095 static void rna_NlaStrip_transform_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00096 {
00097     NlaStrip *strip = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00098 
00099     BKE_nlameta_flush_transforms(strip);
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void rna_NlaStrip_start_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00103 {
00104     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00105     
00106     /* clamp value to lie within valid limits
00107      *  - cannot start past the end of the strip + some flexibility threshold
00108      *  - cannot start before the previous strip (if present) ends
00109      *      -> but if it was a transition, we could go up to the start of the strip + some flexibility threshold
00110      *      as long as we re-adjust the transition afterwards
00111      *  - minimum frame is -MAXFRAME so that we don't get clipping on frame 0
00112      */
00113     if (data->prev) {
00114         if (data->prev->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION) {
00115             CLAMP(value, data->prev->start+NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH, data->end-NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH);
00116             
00117             /* readjust the transition to stick to the endpoints of the action-clips */
00118             data->prev->end = value;
00119         }
00120         else {
00121             CLAMP(value, data->prev->end, data->end-NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH);
00122         }
00123     }
00124     else {
00125         CLAMP(value, MINAFRAME, data->end);
00126     }
00127     data->start = value;
00128 }
00129 
00130 static void rna_NlaStrip_end_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00131 {
00132     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00133     
00134     /* clamp value to lie within valid limits
00135      *  - must not have zero or negative length strip, so cannot start before the first frame
00136      *    + some minimum-strip-length threshold
00137      *  - cannot end later than the start of the next strip (if present)
00138      *      -> but if it was a transition, we could go up to the start of the end - some flexibility threshold
00139      *      as long as we re-adjust the transition afterwards
00140      */
00141     if (data->next) {
00142         if (data->next->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION) {
00143             CLAMP(value, data->start+NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH, data->next->end-NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH);
00144             
00145             /* readjust the transition to stick to the endpoints of the action-clips */
00146             data->next->start = value;
00147         }
00148         else {
00149             CLAMP(value, data->start+NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH, data->next->start);
00150         }
00151     }
00152     else {
00153         CLAMP(value, data->start+NLASTRIP_MIN_LEN_THRESH, MAXFRAME);
00154     }
00155     data->end = value;
00156     
00157     
00158     /* calculate the lengths the strip and its action (if applicable) */
00159     if (data->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_CLIP) {
00160         float len, actlen;
00161         
00162         len = data->end - data->start;
00163         actlen = data->actend - data->actstart;
00164         if (IS_EQF(actlen, 0.0f)) actlen = 1.0f;
00165         
00166         /* now, adjust the 'scale' setting to reflect this (so that this change can be valid) */
00167         data->scale = len / ((actlen) * data->repeat);
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 static void rna_NlaStrip_scale_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00172 {
00173     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00174     
00175     /* set scale value */
00176         /* NOTE: these need to be synced with the values in the property definition in rna_def_nlastrip() */
00177     CLAMP(value, 0.0001f, 1000.0f);
00178     data->scale = value;
00179     
00180     /* adjust the strip extents in response to this */
00181     BKE_nlastrip_recalculate_bounds(data);
00182 }
00183 
00184 static void rna_NlaStrip_repeat_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00185 {
00186     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00187     
00188     /* set repeat value */
00189         /* NOTE: these need to be synced with the values in the property definition in rna_def_nlastrip() */
00190     CLAMP(value, 0.01f, 1000.0f);
00191     data->repeat = value;
00192     
00193     /* adjust the strip extents in response to this */
00194     BKE_nlastrip_recalculate_bounds(data);
00195 }
00196 
00197 static void rna_NlaStrip_blend_in_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00198 {
00199     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00200     float len;
00201     
00202     /* blend-in is limited to the length of the strip, and also cannot overlap with blendout */
00203     len = (data->end - data->start) - data->blendout;
00204     CLAMP(value, 0, len);
00205     
00206     data->blendin = value;
00207 }
00208 
00209 static void rna_NlaStrip_blend_out_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00210 {
00211     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00212     float len;
00213     
00214     /* blend-out is limited to the length of the strip */
00215     len = (data->end - data->start);
00216     CLAMP(value, 0, len);
00217     
00218     /* it also cannot overlap with blendin */
00219     if ((len - value) < data->blendin)
00220         value = len - data->blendin;
00221     
00222     data->blendout = value;
00223 }
00224 
00225 static int rna_NlaStrip_action_editable(PointerRNA *ptr)
00226 {
00227     NlaStrip *strip = (NlaStrip *)ptr->data;
00228     
00229     /* strip actions shouldn't be editable if NLA tweakmode is on */
00230     if (ptr->id.data) {
00231         AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(ptr->id.data);
00232         
00233         if (adt) {
00234             /* active action is only editable when it is not a tweaking strip */
00235             if ((adt->flag & ADT_NLA_EDIT_ON) || (adt->actstrip) || (adt->tmpact))
00236                 return 0;
00237         }
00238     }
00239     
00240     /* check for clues that strip probably shouldn't be used... */
00241     if (strip->flag & NLASTRIP_FLAG_TWEAKUSER)
00242         return 0;
00243         
00244     /* should be ok, though we may still miss some cases */
00245     return 1;
00246 }
00247 
00248 static void rna_NlaStrip_action_start_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00249 {
00250     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00251     
00252     /* prevent start frame from occurring after end of action */
00253     CLAMP(value, MINAFRAME, data->actend);
00254     data->actstart = value;
00255     
00256     /* adjust the strip extents in response to this */
00257     /* TODO: should the strip be moved backwards instead as a special case? */
00258     BKE_nlastrip_recalculate_bounds(data);
00259 }
00260 
00261 static void rna_NlaStrip_action_end_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00262 {
00263     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00264     
00265     /* prevent end frame from starting before start of action */
00266     CLAMP(value, data->actstart, MAXFRAME);
00267     data->actend = value;
00268     
00269     /* adjust the strip extents in response to this */
00270     BKE_nlastrip_recalculate_bounds(data);
00271 }
00272 
00273 static void rna_NlaStrip_animated_influence_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00274 {
00275     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00276     
00277     if (value) {
00278         /* set the flag, then make sure a curve for this exists */
00279         data->flag |= NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_INFLUENCE;
00280         BKE_nlastrip_validate_fcurves(data);
00281     }
00282     else
00283         data->flag &= ~NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_INFLUENCE;
00284 }
00285 
00286 static void rna_NlaStrip_animated_time_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00287 {
00288     NlaStrip *data = (NlaStrip*)ptr->data;
00289     
00290     if (value) {
00291         /* set the flag, then make sure a curve for this exists */
00292         data->flag |= NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_TIME;
00293         BKE_nlastrip_validate_fcurves(data);
00294     }
00295     else
00296         data->flag &= ~NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_TIME;
00297 }
00298 
00299 static NlaStrip *rna_NlaStrip_new(NlaTrack *track, bContext *C, ReportList *reports, const char *UNUSED(name),
00300                                   int start, bAction *action)
00301 {
00302     NlaStrip *strip = add_nlastrip(action);
00303     
00304     if (strip == NULL) {
00305         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to create new strip");
00306         return NULL;
00307     }
00308     
00309     strip->end += (start - strip->start);
00310     strip->start = start;
00311     
00312     if (BKE_nlastrips_add_strip(&track->strips, strip) == 0) {
00313         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR,
00314                     "Unable to add strip. Track doesn't have any space to accommodate this new strip");
00315         free_nlastrip(NULL, strip);
00316         return NULL;
00317     }
00318     
00319     /* create dummy AnimData block so that BKE_nlastrip_validate_name()
00320      * can be used to ensure a valid name, as we don't have one here...
00321      *  - only the nla_tracks list is needed there, which we aim to reverse engineer here...
00322      */
00323     {
00324         AnimData adt = {NULL};
00325         NlaTrack *nlt, *nlt_p;
00326         
00327         /* 'first' NLA track is found by going back up chain of given track's parents until we fall off */
00328         nlt_p = track; nlt = track;
00329         while ((nlt = nlt->prev) != NULL)
00330             nlt_p = nlt;
00331         adt.nla_tracks.first = nlt_p;
00332         
00333         /* do the same thing to find the last track */
00334         nlt_p = track; nlt = track;
00335         while ((nlt = nlt->next) != NULL)
00336             nlt_p = nlt;
00337         adt.nla_tracks.last = nlt_p;
00338         
00339         /* now we can just auto-name as usual */
00340         BKE_nlastrip_validate_name(&adt, strip);
00341     }
00342     
00343     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA|NA_ADDED, NULL);
00344     
00345     return strip;
00346 }
00347 
00348 static void rna_NlaStrip_remove(NlaTrack *track, bContext *C, ReportList *reports, NlaStrip *strip)
00349 {
00350     if (BLI_findindex(&track->strips, strip) == -1) {
00351         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "NLA's Strip '%s' not found in track '%s'", strip->name, track->name);
00352         return;
00353     }
00354     else {
00355         free_nlastrip(&track->strips, strip);
00356         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA|NA_REMOVED, NULL);
00357     }
00358 }

00362 /* enum defines exported for rna_animation.c */
00363 EnumPropertyItem nla_mode_blend_items[] = {
00364     {NLASTRIP_MODE_REPLACE, "REPLACE", 0, "Replace",
00365                             "Result strip replaces the accumulated results by amount specified by influence"},
00366     {NLASTRIP_MODE_ADD, "ADD", 0, "Add", "Weighted result of strip is added to the accumulated results"},
00367     {NLASTRIP_MODE_SUBTRACT, "SUBTRACT", 0, "Subtract",
00368                              "Weighted result of strip is removed from the accumulated results"},
00369     {NLASTRIP_MODE_MULTIPLY, "MULITPLY", 0, "Multiply",
00370                              "Weighted result of strip is multiplied with the accumulated results"},
00371     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00372 EnumPropertyItem nla_mode_extend_items[] = {
00373     {NLASTRIP_EXTEND_NOTHING, "NOTHING", 0, "Nothing", "Strip has no influence past its extents"},
00374     {NLASTRIP_EXTEND_HOLD, "HOLD", 0, "Hold",
00375                            "Hold the first frame if no previous strips in track, and always hold last frame"},
00376     {NLASTRIP_EXTEND_HOLD_FORWARD, "HOLD_FORWARD", 0, "Hold Forward", "Only hold last frame"},
00377     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00378 
00379 static void rna_def_nlastrip(BlenderRNA *brna)
00380 {
00381     StructRNA *srna;
00382     PropertyRNA *prop;
00383     
00384         /* enum defs */
00385     static EnumPropertyItem prop_type_items[] = {
00386         {NLASTRIP_TYPE_CLIP, "CLIP", 0, "Action Clip", "NLA Strip references some Action"},
00387         {NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION, "TRANSITION", 0, "Transition", "NLA Strip 'transitions' between adjacent strips"},
00388         {NLASTRIP_TYPE_META, "META", 0, "Meta", "NLA Strip acts as a container for adjacent strips"},
00389         {NLASTRIP_TYPE_SOUND, "SOUND", 0, "Sound Clip", "NLA Strip representing a sound event for speakers"},
00390         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00391     
00392     /* struct definition */
00393     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "NlaStrip", NULL);
00394     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "NLA Strip", "A container referencing an existing Action");
00395     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_NlaStrip_path");
00396     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_NLA); /* XXX */
00397     
00398     /* name property */
00399     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "name", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00400     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Name", "");
00401     RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_name_set");
00402     RNA_def_struct_name_property(srna, prop);
00403     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00404     
00405     /* Enums */
00406     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00407     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "type");
00408     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE); /* XXX for now, not editable, since this is dangerous */
00409     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_type_items);
00410     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Type", "Type of NLA Strip");
00411     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00412     
00413     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "extrapolation", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00414     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "extendmode");
00415     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, nla_mode_extend_items);
00416     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Extrapolation", "Action to take for gaps past the strip extents");
00417     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00418     
00419     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "blend_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00420     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "blendmode");
00421     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, nla_mode_blend_items);
00422     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blending", "Method used for combining strip's result with accumulated result");
00423     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00424     
00425     /* Strip extents */
00426     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "frame_start", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TIME);
00427     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "start");
00428     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_start_frame_set", NULL);
00429     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Start Frame", "");
00430     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_NlaStrip_transform_update");
00431     
00432     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "frame_end", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TIME);
00433     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "end");
00434     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_end_frame_set", NULL);
00435     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "End Frame", "");
00436     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_NlaStrip_transform_update");
00437     
00438     /* Blending */
00439     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "blend_in", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00440     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "blendin");
00441     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_blend_in_set", NULL);
00442     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend In", "Number of frames at start of strip to fade in influence");
00443     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00444     
00445     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "blend_out", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00446     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "blendout");
00447     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_blend_out_set", NULL);
00448     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Blend Out", "");
00449     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00450     
00451     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_auto_blend", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00452     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_AUTO_BLENDS);
00453     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Auto Blend In/Out",
00454                              "Number of frames for Blending In/Out is automatically determined from "
00455                              "overlapping strips");
00456     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00457     
00458     /* Action */
00459     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "action", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00460     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "act");
00461     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, NULL, "rna_Action_id_poll");
00462     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00463     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, "rna_NlaStrip_action_editable");
00464     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Action", "Action referenced by this strip");
00465     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00466     
00467     /* Action extents */
00468     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "action_frame_start", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TIME);
00469     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "actstart");
00470     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_action_start_frame_set", NULL);
00471     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Action Start Frame", "");
00472     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00473     
00474     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "action_frame_end", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TIME);
00475     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "actend");
00476     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_action_end_frame_set", NULL);
00477     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Action End Frame", "");
00478     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00479     
00480     /* Action Reuse */
00481     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "repeat", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00482     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "repeat");
00483     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_repeat_set", NULL);
00484         /* these limits have currently be chosen arbitarily, but could be extended
00485          * (minimum should still be > 0 though) if needed... */
00486     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.1f, 1000.0f);
00487     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Repeat", "Number of times to repeat the action range");
00488     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00489     
00490     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "scale", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00491     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "scale");
00492     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_scale_set", NULL);
00493         /* these limits can be extended, but beyond this, we can get some crazy+annoying bugs
00494          * due to numeric errors */
00495     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0001f, 1000.0f);
00496     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Scale", "Scaling factor for action");
00497     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00498     
00499     /* Strip's F-Curves */
00500     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "fcurves", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00501     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "FCurve");
00502     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "F-Curves", "F-Curves for controlling the strip's influence and timing");
00503     
00504     /* Strip's F-Modifiers */
00505     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "modifiers", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00506     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "FModifier");
00507     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Modifiers", "Modifiers affecting all the F-Curves in the referenced Action");
00508     
00509     /* Strip's Sub-Strips (for Meta-Strips) */
00510     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "strips", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00511     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "NlaStrip");
00512     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "NLA Strips",
00513                              "NLA Strips that this strip acts as a container for (if it is of type Meta)");
00514     
00515     /* Settings - Values necessary for evaluation */
00516     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "influence", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00517     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00518     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Influence", "Amount the strip contributes to the current result");
00519     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00520     
00521     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "strip_time", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TIME);
00522     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Strip Time", "Frame of referenced Action to evaluate");
00523     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00524     
00525         /* TODO: should the animated_influence/time settings be animatable themselves? */
00526     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_animated_influence", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00527     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_INFLUENCE);
00528     RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_animated_influence_set");
00529     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Animated Influence",
00530                              "Influence setting is controlled by an F-Curve rather than automatically determined");
00531     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00532     
00533     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_animated_time", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00534     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_TIME);
00535     RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_NlaStrip_animated_time_set");
00536     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Animated Strip Time",
00537                              "Strip time is controlled by an F-Curve rather than automatically determined");
00538     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00539     
00540     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_animated_time_cyclic", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00541     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_USR_TIME_CYCLIC);
00542     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Cyclic Strip Time", "Cycle the animated time within the action start & end");
00543     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_NlaStrip_transform_update"); /* is there a better update flag? */
00544     
00545     /* settings */
00546     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "active", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00547         /* can be made editable by hooking it up to the necessary NLA API methods */
00548     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00549     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_ACTIVE);
00550     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active", "NLA Strip is active");
00551     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00552     
00553     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00554     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_SELECT);
00555     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "NLA Strip is selected");
00556     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00557     
00558     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mute", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00559     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_MUTED);
00560     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Muted", "NLA Strip is not evaluated");
00561     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00562     
00563     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_reverse", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00564     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLASTRIP_FLAG_REVERSE);
00565     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Reversed",
00566                              "NLA Strip is played back in reverse order (only when timing is "
00567                              "automatically determined)");
00568     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00569     
00570     /* TODO:  */
00571     /* - sync length */
00572 }
00573 
00574 static void rna_api_nlatrack_strips(BlenderRNA *brna, PropertyRNA *cprop)
00575 {
00576     StructRNA *srna;
00577     PropertyRNA *parm;
00578     FunctionRNA *func;
00579 
00580     RNA_def_property_srna(cprop, "NlaStrips");
00581     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "NlaStrips", NULL);
00582     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "NlaTrack");
00583     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Nla Strips", "Collection of Nla Strips");
00584 
00585     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "new", "rna_NlaStrip_new");
00586     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT|FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00587     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Add a new Action-Clip strip to the track");
00588     parm = RNA_def_string(func, "name", "NlaStrip", 0, "", "Name for the NLA Strips");
00589     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00590     parm = RNA_def_int(func, "start", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Start Frame",
00591                        "Start frame for this strip", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00592     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00593     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "action", "Action", "", "Action to assign to this strip");
00594     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED|PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00595     /* return type */
00596     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "strip", "NlaStrip", "", "New NLA Strip");
00597     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00598 
00599     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "remove", "rna_NlaStrip_remove");
00600     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT|FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00601     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Remove a NLA Strip");
00602     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "strip", "NlaStrip", "", "NLA Strip to remove");
00603     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED|PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00604 }
00605 
00606 static void rna_def_nlatrack(BlenderRNA *brna)
00607 {
00608     StructRNA *srna;
00609     PropertyRNA *prop;
00610     
00611     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "NlaTrack", NULL);
00612     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "NLA Track", "A animation layer containing Actions referenced as NLA strips");
00613     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_NLA);
00614     
00615     /* strips collection */
00616     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "strips", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00617     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "NlaStrip");
00618     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "NLA Strips", "NLA Strips on this NLA-track");
00619 
00620     rna_api_nlatrack_strips(brna, prop);
00621 
00622     /* name property */
00623     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "name", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00624     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Name", "");
00625     RNA_def_struct_name_property(srna, prop);
00626     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00627     
00628     /* settings */
00629     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "active", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00630         /* can be made editable by hooking it up to the necessary NLA API methods */
00631     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00632     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLATRACK_ACTIVE);
00633     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active", "NLA Track is active");
00634     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00635     
00636     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "is_solo", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00637         /* can be made editable by hooking it up to the necessary NLA API methods */
00638     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00639     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLATRACK_SOLO);
00640     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Solo",
00641                              "NLA Track is evaluated itself (i.e. active Action and all other NLA Tracks in the "
00642                              "same AnimData block are disabled)");
00643     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00644     
00645     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00646     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLATRACK_SELECTED);
00647     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "NLA Track is selected");
00648     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00649     
00650     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mute", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00651     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLATRACK_MUTED);
00652     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Muted", "NLA Track is not evaluated");
00653     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00654 
00655     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "lock", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00656     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", NLATRACK_PROTECTED);
00657     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Locked", "NLA Track is locked");
00658     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_ANIMATION|ND_NLA, NULL); /* this will do? */
00659 }

00661 /* --------- */
00662 
00663 void RNA_def_nla(BlenderRNA *brna)
00664 {
00665     rna_def_nlatrack(brna);
00666     rna_def_nlastrip(brna);
00667 }
